column6:
"GALACTUS" Part 2 (of 5),2004,12
Galactus's worst Herald ever - coincidentally a member of the FF - is running out of time. So far, the mystery Herald has been able to stall Galactus from sating his cosmic hunger -- but that luck won't hold forever. What planet will be chosen as Galactus's next victim?
column8: | inker:Karl Kesel | colorist:Paul Mounts | writer:Mark Waid | penciller (cover):Mike Wieringo | letterer:Rus Wooton
